title: Person of interest in custody after shooting near Hammond high school
author: FOX 32 Chicago
comment: I'll take name their race for a hundred.

You know I used to think calling a black male "boy" was seen as a bit... racey... but this segment is making me question that belief because I have to assume this station is further trained in CRT than I am.
description:
One person of interest has been taken into custody as of Friday night, according to police.
